gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 118, Pacers 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Blazers defeated the Pacers, 118-113, and improved to 12-29 on the year. Jerami Grant led Portland with 37 points as Malcolm Brogdon added a season-high 30 points, along with seven rebounds, and six assists. Myles Turner led the Pacers with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and six 3PT, as Pascal Siakam (21 points, six rebounds, three assists), and Tyrese Haliburton (21 points, 17 assists, 0 turnovers) added 38 points. This was Siakam's Indiana debut and Haliburton returned from a five-game absence. The Pacers are now 1-7 this season in back-to-back games and move to 24-18 overall.
